translation: Know Me, O Arjuna, as the eternal seed of all beings; I am the intelligence of the intelligent, and the splendour of the splendid objects.
commentary: 7.10 Seed seed? Mam Me? of all beings? Viddhi know? Partha O Partha? eternal eternal? Intelligence: intelligence? Buddhimatam of the intelligent? Asmi am (I)? Tejah splendour? bright of the splendid? I am I.Commentary Seed means cause.Tejas also means heroism or bravery.Had Arjuna asked? Who is the seed for Thee? would the Lord have replied? There is no seed for Me. There is no cause for Me. I am the source of everything. I am the causeless Cause. I am the primeval Being.
